problem.markdown:
1. Time up to which load has to be maintained in experiment for mild steel is
(x) 15 to 20 seconds () 20 to 25 seconds () 10 to 15 seconds () 5 to 10 seconds
2. In Brinell test indenter used is
(x) Hardened steel ball () Copper ball () Diamond point () Silver ball
3. The property of a material that resists penetration or indentation by means of abrasion or scratching is known as
(x) Hardness () Brittleness () Strength () Toughness
4. What is the minimum thickness of the specimen required?
(x) 8 times depth of indentation () 15 times depth of indentation () 5 times depth of indentation () 20 times depth of indentation
5. What is the diameter of the impression?
() 0.7D-1.3D () 0.1D () 1.3D-1.5D (x) 0.2D-0.7D
